title: Design Matters From The Archive: Massimo Vignelli
description: Debbie talked to Massimo Vignelli about his favorite typeface, his fight against vulgarity and meaningless design, and what he means by forceful design.
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talked to Massimo Vignelli about his favorite typeface, his fight against vulgarity and meaningless design, and what he means by forceful design.
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
